name: Energy Literacy Survey
description: This study contains the questionnaire, datasets and related analysis from a national survey of energy literacy and energy citizenship in Canada, conducted in November 2014.

distribution.name: Energy Literacy and Citizenship in Canada Questionnaire.pdf
distribution.description: Questionnaire for energy literacy and energy citizenship survey in Canada, conducting with online panel in Fall 2014

distribution.name: Energy Study Dataset (6).tab
distribution.description: National survey (n = 3000) of Canadians conducted in the Fall of 2014 on topics related to support and opposition to energy technology, perceived and factual knowledge of energy systems, energy literacy, trust in energy system actors, levels of public engagement in energy issues.

distribution.name: PR-15-01.pdf
distribution.description: Project report on energy literacy and energy citizenship in Canada, conducted with an online panel in Fall 2014
